sen.j: 舞鶴親海公園（まいづるしんかいこうえん）は、京都府舞鶴市にある公園。
sen.e: Maizuru Shinkai Park (Maizuru Sea Park) is a park in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Maizuru Shinkai Park (Maizuru Sea Park) is a park in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Maizuru Shinkai Park (Maizuru Sea Park) is a park in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
A free parking area is available.
A free parking area is available.
A free parking area is available.

sen.j: 舞鶴市千歳地区で2004年（平成16年）8月3日に新たにオープンした公園で、関西電力の協力で整備された。
sen.e: This park was built in cooperation with the Kansai Electric Co., Inc., and newly opened at Chitose Area of Maizuru City on August 3, 2004.
This park was built in cooperation with the Kansai Electric Co., Inc., and newly opened in the Chitose Area of Maizuru City on August 3, 2004.
This park was built in cooperation with the Kansai Electric Co., Inc., and newly opened in the Chitose Area of Maizuru City on August 3, 2004.

sen.j: 全長120mの釣り護岸が人気を集めており、また護岸全体に安全柵が施してあるため休日などには家族で楽しむ姿を見ることができる。
sen.e: This park has a 120-m-long embankment for fishing, where people enjoy holidays with families, because it is equipped with a safety fence around it.
This park has a 120-m-long embankment for fishing, where people enjoy holidays with their families, because it is equipped with a safety fence around it.
This park has a 120-meter-long embankment for fishing, where people enjoy holidays with their families, because it is equipped with a safety fence around it.

sen.j: ちなみに海水を引いた「親水池」などもある。
sen.e: It also has 'Shinsui Pond' (literally a pond for enjoying water) to which sea water is supplied.
It also has 'Shinsui Pond' (literally a pond for enjoying water) to which sea water is supplied.
It also has 'Shinsui Pond' (literally a pond for enjoying water) to which sea water is supplied.

sen.j: さらに旅客船をイメージした関西電力の舞鶴発電所PR館「エル・マールまいづる」が停泊しており、日本初のプラネタリウムが楽しめる。
sen.e: At Maizuru Power Plant's PR Hall 'El Mar Maizuru' which is modeled after a luxury ocean liner, you can enjoy Japan's first planetarium on the sea.
At Maizuru Power Plant's PR Hall 'El Mar Maizuru' which is modeled after a luxury ocean liner, you can enjoy Japan's first planetarium.
At Maizuru Power Plant's PR Hall 'El Mar Maizuru' which is modeled after a luxury ocean liner, you can enjoy Japan's first planetarium.

sen.j: またエネルギー体験館や客船歴史館などのアミューズメント施設が整っている。
sen.e: It has also amusement facilities, such as a hall for learning of energy generation, and a museum of ocean liner history.
It also has other facilities, such as a hall for learning about energy generation, and a museum of ocean liner history.
It also has other facilities, such as a hall for learning about energy generation, and a museum of ocean liner history.

sen.j: 漁村レストラン「海仙楽」（1000～2100、水曜休）
sen.e: Fishing village restaurant 'Kaisenraku' (海仙楽): opened 10:00 - 21:00: closed on Wednesdays

sen.j: 西日本旅客鉄道 舞鶴線 西舞鶴駅・東舞鶴駅から西大浦バスで約20分。
sen.e: From Nishi-Maizuru Station or Higashi-Maizuru Station of JR Maizuru Line, Nishi Oura Bus takes you to this park in approximately 20 minutes.
From Nishi-Maizuru Station or Higashi-Maizuru Station on the JR Maizuru Line, the Nishi Oura Bus takes you to this park in approximately 20 minutes.

sen.j: 舞鶴若狭自動車道 舞鶴東インターチェンジより車で約20分。
sen.e: From the exit at Maizuru-Higashi Interchange of Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway, approximately 20 minutes by car.
From the Maizuru-Higashi exit on the Maizuru-Wakasa Expressway, approximately 20 minutes by car.
